short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to hide and add comments to Yad2 listings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will add a 'hide' button to the listings (you can hide and then 'unhide' the listings). Also, every listing now has a note box, where you can add an arbitrary note like 'landlord requires שיק בנקאי'.

Your notes and hidden items are stored locally and not go anywhere!
